page.title: 09HEALTH CARE IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {HEALTH CARE IN WOODHALL SPA The area is looked after by a primary health care team consisting of:_ {General Practitioners Surgeries are held in Woodhall Spa 6 days a week where patients are seen by appointment.Home visits are carried out as necessary .Patients needing hospital or specialist treatment are referred to Lincoln County Hospital or Boston Pilgrim Hospital.Medicines are obtained from the village chemist or dispensed by the doctor where a patient lives more than 1 mile from the chemist's shop. {District Nurses They carry out nursing treatment in patients' homes.Referrals come from the G.P. or hospital.They also carry out nursing procedures at surgery 3 mornings a week.Nursery attendants bath the aged and infirm once a week.
